The system includes: Buyer preference analysis agents that understand what drives real purchasing decisions; Valuation agents that separate price estimation from true market value; Real-time market sentiment agents that adjust for current buyer behavior; Transparency agents that democratize home valuation data. "VoltAgent gave us the foundation to build something that actually understands the difference between what a home costs and what it's worth to buyers."
